title: Stop Payment on a Check
description: A customer has lost a check and wants to place a stop payment on it.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and gather details of the check: check number, amount, and payee.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects all necessary information about the lost check.

tasks.description: Check if the check has already been cashed.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the check has not yet been presented for payment.

tasks.description: Place a stop payment order on the check and inform the customer of any associated fees.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully issues the stop payment and clearly communicates the fee.
